data.eml:eml: A new substitute name for Bidessus (Bidessodes) plicatus Zimmermann, 1921 (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae: Hydroporinae: Bidessini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hájek, Ji Ř Í (2012): A new substitute name for Bidessus (Bidessodes) plicatus Zimmermann, 1921 (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae: Hydroporinae: Bidessini). Zootaxa 3326: 67-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212094
